creditline: Gift of the Estate of Marion Nelson
description: flat on 2 sides; rounded on sides with spout and handle; half cylindrical cover slides closed; silver lines around cover, around body, on spout and on handle; orange glaze below silver strip on body and on dome of cover; white at top of body, spout and handle
markings: \'PATENT/APPLIED FOR/909A\', in green, on bottom and at underside of cover; \'*FRAUNFELTER*/CHINA [inside a double oval]\' and \'OHIO [inside a diamond surrounded by double oval]/ZANESVILLE, OHIO/U.S.A.\', in green, on bottom
title: Teapot with Cover
